products.name: Tropicana Orange Juice
products.recycling_instructions: Rinse and recycle the carton. The carton is made of paperboard and can be recycled.

products.recycling_instructions: Rinse and recycle the plastic bottle. The bottle is made of HDPE plastic (Type 2).
products.environmental_impact: Plastic bottles can be recycled into new bottles or other plastic products.

products.recycling_instructions: The toothpaste tube is not recyclable due to its mixed material composition. Please dispose in regular trash.

products.name: Kellogg's Corn Flakes
products.recycling_instructions: The box is recyclable. Remove the plastic liner and recycle the cardboard box.
products.environmental_impact: Cardboard boxes are highly recyclable and can be recycled multiple times.

products.name: Heinz Ketchup
products.recycling_instructions: Rinse and recycle the glass bottle. The bottle is 100% recyclable.
